title: Night of the Phantom
description: THE NIGHT WAS HISBetween dawn and dusk, Ethan Winslowe's weird mansion was as still as a crypt. Beneath its maze of gloomy corridors, its owner slept far from reach of the sun.As night fell, and fears and phantasms rose to haunt her, Megan Carey was led down to his underground lair--to dine with a phantom she never saw, who remained a dark shape hidden among shadows.Reputation had it that Ethan was a genius, madman and monster. And Megan was Ethan's prisoner, held fast by a threat stronger than chains . . . .And by a hunger to know the heat of Ethan's passion, which raged like a fire in the night.
author: Anne Stuart
